value.stringValue: The C_Case_Onb_Reminder_Cycle_New-3 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke C_Case_Onb_Reminder_Cycle_New-3, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The C_Case_Onb_Reminder_Cycle_New-3 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke C_Case_Onb_Reminder_Cycle_New-3, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

Flow.description: Timed Notifications to remind Users and Customers to start the onboarding CDS-474
Flow.label: C - Case Onb. Reminder Cycle 'New'

value.stringValue: After 3 weeks, two reminder mails and 2 attempts of contact, this case is still on status new. Please send the final notification to the customer, that we are going to close their onboarding case for the time being.
This onboarding case has been created created 10 days ago, first reminder mail has been send 5 days ago, but status is still new. Please reach out to the customer and try to get the show started
This onboarding case has been created created 13 days ago, first reminder mail has been send 8 days ago, but status is still new. Please reach out to the customer and try to get the show started
